long_description: With stretchy, resilient fabric, the Roam Pants from Lole have what it takes to keep you comfortable whether you're traveling across the city or multiple time zones. Lightweight, breathable, stretchy nylon/polyester fabric blend resists odors and wrinkles, ideal for wearing multiple days in a row while you're on the go. Fabric also wicks moisture away from skin for warm-weather comfort; built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields your skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Lole Roam Pants feature a slim fit for a streamlined look; regular rise waistband; 2 zippered front pockets; 2 welt back pockets.
short_description: With stretchy, resilient fabric, the Roam Pants from Lole have what it takes to keep you comfortable whether you're traveling across the city or multiple time zones.
